page.title: 09The Minister in Unst
page.content: Reverend Kenneth Ross,the Church of Scotland minister,has lived in this area for three years.He preaches in two churches-St.John's in Baltasound,and Uyeasound. His "parish" is the whole of Unst. The average church attendance is 40-50 adults and 30-40 children per week.Christian instruction for young people is provided at the Sunday School,a Bible class and at the Boy's Brigade(for boys six years and over) Rev. Ross also visits pupils in Baltasound School every week.For adults there is a Kirk Bible Study and for women,the Women's Guild and Young Women's Bible Study.A minister working in Unst has to be flexible-as well as unpredictable events(like sudden deaths),there are always new people coming to join the congregation.
